name: Ogre Land
description:
Adventure game on its earliest prototyping stage. A lot of things to correct and improve.  There are some actions that will cause a different effect on the history (little effect). I will keep on improving this prototype.

Basic Controls:

W-A-S-D   ->  Player  motion.

Mouse Input ->  Third Person Camera view.

R -> Attack

F -> Interact (only when selected with the mouse cursor)

Install Instructions:

After downloading the file (*.zip),  extract files and run "ogre_land.exe".
